column3: News;Sihanoukville: A Chinese woman lost her mind at 3:00 am on October 16
column7: Sihanoukville.------Police say that the Chinese woman’s identity is not yet known
column8: but she is about 30 years old. She was acting all crazy
column9: biting herself writhing around and stripping off. It is quite possible she was on drugs.------Cambodians rescued the woman and tried to cover her modestly
column10: until police arrived and sent her to the Sihanoukville Referral Hospital for sympathy treatment.------Source DAP------https://www.facebook.com/100011153076359/videos/702547583460338/
